name: Electric Grotto
description:
Work in progress JamCraft3 entry.

Keyboard support:
Use WASD and the mouse to play.

Controller support:
Left Stick to Move. Use A to Jump, B to Drill.

Alpha Build, crafting isn't working so, whoops.
